tags.name: Management
tags.description: other actions about system and users

tags.name: Distribution
tags.description: distribute the selection of courses and generate the result

get.description: get current userID and authority. Need Authority: User

400.description: Failed, hasn't entered or can't find userID

get.description: Get open time. Need Authority: None

put.summary: update open time. Need Authority: Admin

get.summary: get a list of courses with selected attributes
get.description:
Get a list of all courses with selected attributes.
Use query parameters to specify the attributes you want (id is default. Name, type, description and options are optional).
For example, if you wanna get id, name and type, the request will be like "http://localhost:8000/api/courses?name=1&type=1. Need Authority: User

get.summary: get a list of selection of the user
get.description: Get a list of all selections of the user. Need Authority: User

get.summary: get a list of users with selected attributes
get.description:
Get a list of all users with optional attributes.
Use query parameters to specify the attributes you want (id is default. Name, grade, authority are optional).
For example, if you wanna get id, authority, and grade, the request will be like "http://localhost:8000/api/users?grade=1&authority=1. Need Authority: Maintainer

post.description: Add new users. Need Authority: Admin

delete.description: Delete particular users with a list specifying their ids. Need Authority: Admin

put.description: Change the content of the student of designated userIDs. Need Authority: Admin
admin changes certain users' password. Need Authority: Admin

post.description: Add new course. Need Authority: Maintainer

requestBody.description:
type

"1,2,3,4": 必修
"Ten-Select-Two": 十選二實驗
"EE-Lab": 電電實驗

number

可以選上的數量

limit

人數上限

priority_type

"higher-grade-first": 高年級優先
"grades": 某些年同等優先(若array裡只有一項，及該年級優先)，其餘平等
"guarantee-third-grade": 大三保障名額
"guarantee-fourth-grade": 保障大四名額
"preselect":可以寫已經選上的人
"none","": 無年級優先

以下為兩個課程範例, priority_type, priority_value 只有 customized 會用到, 其他type無需.description 目前為必要

example.name: 十選二實驗 test
example.description:
(1) 請詳閱 實驗規定，攸關各位的權利。

(2)特別轉載半導體實驗規定： ★★大學畢業後欲投入半導體領域者，可保留名額 ★★實驗期間需全程戴口罩、穿實驗衣含無塵衣,且著裝後需能自由移動。 ★★需遵守政府、臺大及實驗室之公共安全規定。 ★★環安衛法律條文規定沒有英文部份,若有外藉生不懂中文,將請助教以英文口譯告知。 ★★Electrical Engineering Lab (semiconductor) safety rules: ★In the labs, students are required

400.description: The course has already existed, no input, format error

delete.description: Delete courses by **course ID**. Need Authority: Maintainer

put.description: Change the content of the course of designated ids. Need Authority: Maintainer

requestBody.description:
type

"1,2,3,4": 必修
"Ten-Select-Two": 十選二實驗
"EE-Lab": 電電實驗
>

number

可以選上的數量

limit

人數上限

priority_type

"higher-grade-first": 高年級優先
"grades": 某些年同等優先(若array裡只有一項，及該年級優先)，其餘平等
"guarantee-third-grade": 大三保障名額
"guarantee-fourth-grade": 保障大四名額
"preselect":可以寫已經選上的人
"none","": 無年級優先

以下為兩個課程範例, priority_type, priority_value 只有 customized 會用到, 其他type無需.description 目前為必要

post.description: Run distribution algorithm. Need Authority: Admin

Run distribution algorithm(test).
If request body is empty, it will run the original distribution; otherwise, it will run the distribution with specific students given by request body. Need Authority: Admin

put.description: Change someone's authority. Need Authority: Admin

get.summary: get a user's selection on certain course
get.description: Show the course selection status of a user according to current session. Need Authority: User

parameters.name: courseID
parameters.description: select the id of the course that you want to know your selections

put.description:
select course using path parameter and req body

Update the selection of a course.

Need Authority: User

requestBody.description: send a list of userIDs that are preselected in 數電實驗

get.description:
get distribution result (csv)

要先跑 /distribute.

Need Authority: Admin

schema.example:
studentID,courseName,optionName
B00000000,電路學,老師A
B11111111,機率與統計,老師H

get.description:
get distribution result (csv)

要先跑 /distribute.

Need Authority: Admin

schema.example:
studentID,courseName,optionName
B00000000,電路學,老師A
B11111111,機率與統計,老師H

delete.description: delete SELECTION, PRESELECT, RESULT data in mongo. Need Authority: Admin

Use query parameters to specify the attributes you want (id is default. Name, type, description and options are optional).
For example, if you wanna get id, name and type, the request will be like "http://localhost:8000/api/courses?name=1&type=1. Need Authority: Maintainer
